name: chat-sample
description: Sample chat extension, a trusty cat tutor that will can teach you computer science topics.

languageModelTools.name: edit-tools-migration-guideline
languageModelTools.modelDescription: The migration guideline tool provides step by step guideline on how to migrate from one resource type to another azure resource.

migrateScenario.description: The migration scenario, normally it like 'migration from <resource type> to <resource type>'

from.description: The resource type the user is migrating from

to.description: The resource type the user want to migrating to

languageModelTools.modelDescription: Search for files in the current workspace

pattern.description: Search for files that match this glob pattern

languageModelTools.modelDescription: Run a command in a terminal and return the output
